name: Epilogue
description: Epilogue is a sans serif variable font with a weight axis. 9 weights, upright and italic. It supports a wide range of languages in the latin script scope. The Epilogue project is led by Tyler Finck â€” type designer running Etcetera Type Co in Ithaca, New-York, USA. To contribute, see github.com/Etcetera-Type-Co/Epilogue
author: Tyler Finck, ETC
